produtos.name: Bulbasaur
produtos.description: There is a plant seed on its back right from the day this Pok√©mon is born. The seed slowly grows larger..

produtos.name: Ivysaur
produtos.description: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

produtos.name: Venusaur
produtos.description: Its plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

produtos.name: Charmander
produtos.description: It has a preference for hot things. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.
